summary: WWE Raw is a popular wrestling show on TV. It's been on since 1993 and is one of WWE's biggest shows. Every Monday, it's live on the USA Network at 8 p.m. ET. The wrestlers on the show are part of the "Raw" brand. Over the years, it has moved to different channels but will be on Netflix in 2025. You can also watch old episodes on Peacock. Raw has been filmed in many places around the world, including the USA, Canada, the UK, and even Afghanistan and Iraq.
title: WWE Raw
